file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-91-00-06 - OIL STORAGE SYSTEM - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL OIL STORAGE SYSTEM - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the check of the APU oil level through the oil level sight glass. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH APU 49-91-00-200-801-A ♦ OIL-LEVEL SIGHT GLASS - INSPECTION T-62T-40C11 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-91-00 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-91-00-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 2. OIL-LEVEL SIGHT GLASS - INSPECTION A. General (1) The sight glass is installed near the filler port on the left lower side of the reduction drive assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-42-00/100 - AMM TASK 12-12-02-600-801-A/300 AUXILIARY-POWER-UNIT FILLING C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313CL APU Cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the APU work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THE APU CONTROL MASTER SWITCH IS IN THE “OFF” POSITION TO PREVENT AN APU ACCIDENTAL OPERATION. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – APU FUEL SOV. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 49-91-00 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (3) Put the ladder in position and open the APU access panel 313CL (AMM MPP 06-42-00/100). J. Check Oil Level and Service Oil System as required (Figure 601) SUBTASK 210-002-A (1) Do a visual check of the APU oil level through the oil level sight glass. Add lubricating oil as required ( AMM TASK 12-12-02-600-801-A/300). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the APU access panel 313CL (AMM MPP 06-42-00/100) and remove the ladder. (2) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close these circuit breakers. – APU FUEL SOV. (3) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 49-91-00 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
